title: My Former Significant Others Were All Alphas - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Betrayal   Bisexual Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Manipulative Characters   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Omegaverse   Short Story
author: Yan ZhaoMu   言朝暮
description:
Xia Lin was a beta. More importantly, he possessed the mystical ability where every alpha that dates him would meet their destined omega.

Xia Lin: If I date another alpha, I’ll live-broadcast myself eating my keyboard. All machinery, no sugar!>
